skins.shipDescription: Queen Elizabeth-class battleship C Valiant (HMS Valiant.)
skins.selfIntroduction: Queen Elizabeth-class battleship, Valiant. Hehe, this fleet is known from Jutland to the Far East for its heroic majesty, and I am the reason for that! Now, Commander, you shall become my assistant so that you may prove your worth as a subordinate.
skins.acquisition: To be Valiant is to be me. Remember this face, for it is the face of a fleet leader! ...Speaking of faces, who are you? The Commander? Very well! I shall treat you as my personal servant!
skins.login: It's about time! Now, show me today's itinerary!
skins.details: Look, isn't Elizabeth acting a bit too spoiled? And Warspite and the others are totally enabling that. I knew I should have been the one in charge... Huhh? I'm more or less the same...? Wh-what did you say?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: So thirsty... Ahem. My attendant, do tell the Maid Team to brew me some black tea. Hmm, on second thought... that'd take too long. You can do it for me, can't you?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Charisma is the most important facet of a leader! To be charismatic is to command dignity, to imbue your every word with gravitas! Ahem... did you get all that?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Snack time?! ...Ahem! A proper leader must know how to balance their work with their life. Please do not forget that.
skins.secretaryTouch: Speak your mind, my attendant. You have my ear.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: What's the meaning of this?! Grrr... As a charismatic, generous, and VERY patient person, I will forgive you just this once!

skins.shipDescription: Hehe~ As this medical facility training is crucially important, a charismatic leader such as myself would be best suited to instruct everyone onC Wait a moment, what's with this outfit?! You there, explain the meaning of this at once!
skins.acquisition: Hehe~ As this medical facility training is crucially important, a charismatic leader such as myself would be best suited to instruct everyone onC Wait a moment, what's with this outfit?! You there, explain the meaning of this at once!
skins.login: It's about time! ...Wait, just kidding! You're supposed to be the patient, right? How about you stop walking around so much? Get back in bed this instant!
skins.details: Hey you, don't tell me you're actually enjoying being taken care of like this?! Grr... How unfair! How about this, next time, I'll be the patient, and you'll attend to my every whim!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Don't get any weird ideas. I'm only pouring tea for you because you're the patient!
skins.secretaryIdle2: When we're not training for this exercise, how about a game of chess? I already brought the board. I'll set it up, so just wait in bed!
skins.secretaryIdle3: As a patient, so you're supposed to listen to the nurse! Mm... Besides, shouldn't you already be heeding my every instruction? You're my attendant after all...
skins.secretaryIdle4: You're my patient today! Heheh, be grateful that you're now under the care of the charismatic nurse, Valiant, and heed my every command! ...It, it's not like I'm into this or anything, so don't expect me to do this every single time!
skins.secretaryIdle5: It's time to get your blood drawn, so stick your arm out! ...Geh... I can't handle this stuff like Vampire does...
skins.secretaryTouch: What's the matter? Are you going to die if I don't take care of you~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...I, I'm only overlooking this because you're the patient!
